customer_name: Enchantment Courier Of N M, L L C
site_name: Enchantment Courier of NM, L L C

citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
An inspection of this registrant was attempted on 5/6/14 at 3:30 PM but no responsible person was available to
accompany this APHIS official.
The carrier shall allow APHIS officials to inspect their property and animals during business hours and make a
responsible adult available to accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
To be corrected by: May 30, 2014.
Additional Inspectors
Schmitz Jennifer, Compliance Specialist
